title: Role
description: A named collection of Permissions implementing RBAC per NIST SP 800-53 AC-2 and AC-6. Roles can inherit from parent roles (role hierarchy), accumulating permissions transitively. The level attribute defines the role privilege tier for least-privilege enforcement.

inheritsFrom.description: Name of the parent role this role inherits permissions from. Supports single inheritance; the child accumulates all permissions of the referenced role in addition to its own.
